mainText: I never knew Steve personally, and I always sort of imagined him as a somewhat Godlike figure; I had no idea what he did every day, had a vague picture of him in my head but no concrete one, and he seemed awesome, but I couldn't know for sure. From what I've read, not only was he an innovative genius with global power, but a pretty cool guy in person. RIP Steve Jobs - the definer of a generation.
author: Anonymous
